resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: On November 17, 1845, to be precise, Victor Hugo begins the writing of his novel with what is now his second book, "La Chute" (The Fall).
resource.chars: On November 17, 1845, to be precise, Victor Hugo begins the writing of his novel with what is now his second book, "La Chute" (The Fall).
